verses.name: James 2:1
verses.text: My brethren, have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Lord of glory, with respect of persons.

verses.name: James 2:2
verses.text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring, in goodly apparel, and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment;

verses.name: James 2:3
verses.text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing, and say unto him, Sit thou here in a good place; and say to the poor, Stand thou there, or sit here under my footstool:

verses.name: James 2:4
verses.text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves, and are become judges of evil thoughts?
